sentences.en: After Alan’s death, his mother received his personal effects .
sentences.cn: 艾伦死后，他母亲接收了他的私人物品。

sentences.en: celebrities with their own personal trainer
sentences.cn: 拥有私人健身教练的名流

sentences.en: Every line etched on her face told a story of personal anguish.
sentences.cn: 她脸上的每条皱纹都讲述了一次痛苦的经历。

sentences.en: He learned this lesson the hard way from his own personal experience.
sentences.cn: 吃一堑长一智，他这个教训来之不易——是从他自己的亲身经历中得来的。

sentences.en: He was a personal friend whom I've known for many many years.
sentences.cn: 他是一位我认识多年的私人朋友。

sentences.en: I know from personal experience that you can’t trust Ralph.
sentences.cn: 根据我的亲身经验，我认为你不能相信拉尔夫。

sentences.en: IBM has also shifted its focus from mainframes to personal computers.
sentences.cn: IBM公司也把重心从特大型机转向了个人电脑。

sentences.en: In the last five years he's undergone a personal transformation.
sentences.cn: 过去5年里他整个人发生了全新的转变。

sentences.en: My personal life has had to take second place to my career.
sentences.cn: 我的私人生活不得不让位于事业。

sentences.en: My personal view is that we shouldn’t offer him the job.
sentences.cn: 我个人认为我们不该给他这份工作。

sentences.en: Nearly 60% of our bookings come from repeat business and personal recommendation.
sentences.cn: 我们近60%的订单来自于回头客和熟人介绍。

sentences.en: On a personal level he felt sympathy for them, but he had a job to do.
sentences.cn: 从个人角度他很同情他们，但是他有任务在身。

sentences.en: Political and personal ambitions are starting to prevail over economic interests.
sentences.cn: 政治抱负和个人野心开始压倒经济利益。

sentences.en: She has taken my enquiry as a personal affront.
sentences.cn: 她将我的询问当成了人身侮辱。

sentences.en: She took full personal responsibility for all the arrangements.
sentences.cn: 她个人对所有的安排承担全部责任。

sentences.en: Sir Geoffrey had no personal animosity towards the Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 杰弗里爵士对首相并无私人恩怨。

sentences.en: Small companies can devote more personal attention to each project.
sentences.cn: 小公司可以投入更多精力自己处理每个项目。

sentences.en: Style and colour are a matter of personal taste .
sentences.cn: 款式和颜色是个人爱好问题。

sentences.en: Subconsciously I had known that I would not be in personal danger.
sentences.cn: 我潜意识里已经知道我不会有人身危险。

sentences.en: The car is for personal use only.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车仅供私人使用。

sentences.en: The dishes he produces all have a personal touch.
sentences.cn: 他做的菜全都带有其个人风格。

sentences.en: the personal qualities needed to be successful in business
sentences.cn: 生意成功所需要的个人素质

sentences.en: There are times when personal feelings cannot be allowed to intrude.
sentences.cn: 有些时候是不允许夹杂个人感情的。

sentences.en: They run it with a truly professional but personal touch.
sentences.cn: 他们的经营既有真正的专业水准又不乏个人特色。

sentences.en: They siphon foreign aid money into their personal bank accounts.
sentences.cn: 他们把国外救济金非法转入了个人银行账户。

sentences.en: When I went to her room all her personal belongings had gone.
sentences.cn: 我到她房间时，她所有的私人物品都已不在了。

words.tran_cn: 亲自地；当面；个别地；就自己而言
个性化（personalize的过去式）；个人化

phrases.tran_cn: 个人护理；个人护理用品
个人发展；人的能力发展
个人信息，个人情况；个人资料，个人资讯
个人利益；个人兴趣爱好

trans.tran_cn: 个人的，亲自的，人际的，个别的，针对个人的，身体的，私人的
trans.tran_en: belonging or relating to one particular person, rather than to other people or to people in general

trans.tran_cn: 人事消息栏；人称代名词
